extendedInfo.description: Are you a mobile merchant who accepts payments? Vwalaa! Mobile Pay is just the ticket.  Quickly and securely accept payments, review customer data, email receipts, track transactions, and much more â all through your Android device.Additional Features include:- Vwalaa! Merchant Portal for self-service reporting & management- Cash Sales transaction history- Create and accept payments for your own inventory- Previous purchase recognition & personalized receipts (with product image and descriptions)- Online & offline processing capabilities to protect against lost wireless connectivity- Voids, Refunds, Signature capture, Tax & Tip Calculator, Inquiries- Review transactions and batches within 30 days-  Add your logo, company URL and a personal message on receipts** GETTING STARTED **Vwalaa! Mobile Pay requires that you have a merchant account. If you donât accept credit cards today, we can help you quickly set up an account â simply call us at 1.800.933.0064 x 5592 and we will gladly assist you. If you do have a merchant account, please give us a call anyway. We can still help you and would love the opportunity to earn your business.Hereâs what youâll need:1. Android device with data (service) plan2. Vwalaa! Mobile Pay downloadable app3. Optional Mobile Card ReaderOnce your Vwalaa! Mobile Pay account activated, you will receive an activation email with further instructions and a user guide that will help familiarize you with the Vwalaa! Mobile Pay application.Ready to get started? Contact Us Today!Please call 1.800.933.0064, x 5592 or at merchantservices@vwalaamobile.com.

reviews.title: So User Friendly
reviews.comment: Easy to load inventory. Clean, simple app. Portal so simple I didn\'t need instructions.
reviews.author: Carrie Rattle

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This a greap app and easy to use.
reviews.author: Arianex Diaz

reviews.title: Excellent mobile payments app
reviews.comment: Easy to navigate and very user friendly.  No need for my old terminal anymore.  Thanks.
reviews.author: George Holmes

reviews.comment: This is the best mobile payment solution on the market! If you\'re a mobile merchant with no physical store front, this is for you! 5 stars!!\tGreat app!
reviews.author: edilson baccarin

reviews.title: Great & convenient app
reviews.comment: This app is wonderful. Very user friendly, a big change from what I\'m used to. I added my entire inventory with fixed pricing to my phone. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Gerald Johnson

reviews.title: Very Happy Customer!
reviews.comment: After my wireless terminal broke my sales agent offered me this app as a replacement. the inventory system lets me quickly add items and provide itemized receipts even for cash sales! I love it!
reviews.author: Jason Midal

reviews.comment: Great app!   I am going to get my staff to add to there phones so I they can handle it with out me.
reviews.author: Michael Kline
